permission.title: Enable Clipboard Detection
permission.reason_desc: To automatically detect encrypted messages from your contacts when you copy them. When you return to Nahan, we check if your clipboard contains a message from someone in your contact list and offer to import it automatically.
permission.privacy_desc: This app is 100% OFFLINE. All encryption and decryption happens locally on your device. No data ever leaves your device. We only check the clipboard when you return to this tab, and only process messages from contacts you've already added.

privacy_points.check: Clipboard is only checked when you switch back to this tab
privacy_points.contacts: Only messages from your contacts are processed
privacy_points.local: All processing happens locally - no network requests
privacy_points.revoke: You can revoke this permission anytime in your browser settings

stealth.title: Stealth Mode
stealth.subtitle: Hide your encrypted message inside a cover text using invisible characters.
stealth.placeholder: Type or paste a cover text...

how_it_works.title: How it works
how_it_works.desc: The encrypted data is encoded into Zero-Width Characters and embedded into the cover text. The output looks exactly like the cover text but contains the hidden message.

info.title: Security Information
info.desc: NAHAN uses industry-standard OpenPGP encryption with ECC Curve25519 keys.

points.1: All encryption happens locally on your device
points.2: No data is transmitted to external servers
points.3: Private keys are encrypted with your passphrase
points.4: Messages are signed and encrypted for authenticity

advanced.title: Advanced Options
advanced.subtitle: Show additional security settings
advanced.warning: These options are for advanced users. Use with caution.

export.title: Export All Data
export.info_desc: This will export all your identities (with encrypted private keys) and contacts to a JSON file.
export.password_placeholder: Enter a password to protect the export

notes.1: Private keys remain encrypted with your original passphrases
notes.2: This export file should be stored securely
notes.3: The export password adds an additional layer of protection

export.password_error: Please enter a password for the export file

logout.title: Logout & Wipe
logout.warning: Logging out will permanently delete all your data. This action cannot be undone.

clear_messages.title: Clear Message Data
clear_messages.warning: This will remove all message history but keep your contacts and identity. You will remain logged in. This action cannot be undone.

clear.title: Clear All Data
clear.warning: This action will permanently delete all identities, contacts, and messages. This cannot be undone.
clear.recommendation: Consider exporting your data first before clearing it, in case you need it later.
clear.confirm_alert: Are you sure you want to clear all data? This action cannot be undone.
